name: strava_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Strava in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.athlete-list li, .search-results .row, .text-headline a[href*="/athletes/"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/athletes/"], .text-headline'); const locEl = el.querySelector('.location, .text-caption'); results.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href || '', location: locEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { query: new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get('text') || '', result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
